contest-event.event-date:
July 7, 1985 D Bacchus Hotel Brass Band Entertainment Contest
Bacchus Hotel Brass Band Entertainment Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
bacchus-hotel-brass-band-entertainment-contest
None
Bacchus Hotel, Sutton on Sea, Lincolnshire, England, UK Highest placed section 4 band - Maltby Miners. Best soloist - Ray Speed (tenor horn) Barrow Colliery. Best percussion - Barrow Colliery Prizes - 1st £200 and trophy, 2nd £125, 3rd £80, 4th £50, 5th £30. 12 bands competed.
Oct. 14, 2014, 3:19 p.m. Feb. 6, 2017, 11:26 a.m.

2 Wakefield Metropolitan Band Les Heppleston
3 Hatfield Band Ken Johnson
